entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 06:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -27.0°C
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -29.8°C
Wind: S 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
